name: LT-Innovate
legal: Company Limited by Guarantee - not for profit
goal: LT-Innovate is the Association of the Language Technology Industry. Language Technology makes the world intelligent, multilingual and interactive. LT-Innovate promotes all sectors of LT e.g. translation, speech, analytics.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: All initiatives relevant to the language technology industry. These include, but are not limited to: Digital initiatives like New Generation Internet, the Digital Single Market, and legislation touching upon LT in its widest sense.
